by Amazingizzyisnotonfire

Daniel Howell. YouTuber, friend and roomate of Phil Lester. He has done so many scary and amazing things, such as touring the world with his very own stage show. What’s a little surgery compared to that? And, it couldn’t possibly compare to the fear he gets that Phil will find out about his huge crush on him.

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: Why is japan special? I wasn’t in phandom when they went there, but I’ve noticed people seem to think of that particular...
question: Why is japan special? I wasn’t in phandom when they went there, but I’ve noticed people seem to think of that particular vacation very fondly and wonder when they will return there. What makes japan stand out from all the other vacations they’ve gone to together?
answer: It was like, the one place they both really wanted to go but never had, and I seem to remember the trip being a sort of “calm before the storm” scenario. Maybe it was tatinof, but I seem to think the Japan trip was like “okay we’re about to do something big and stressful so let’s go to Japan and find our chill first.” But maybe I’m totally wrong about that.

reblog.comment: It was like, the one place they both really wanted to go but never had, and I seem to remember the trip being a sort of “calm before the storm” scenario. Maybe it was tatinof, but I seem to think the Japan trip was like “okay we’re about to do something big and stressful so let’s go to Japan and find our chill first.” But maybe I’m totally wrong about that.

Maybe it was tatinof, but I seem to think the Japan trip was like “okay we’re about to do something big and stressful so let’s go to Japan and find our chill first.” But maybe I’m totally wrong about that.

Maybe it was tatinof, but I seem to think the Japan trip was like “okay we’re about to do something big and stressful so let’s go to Japan and find our chill first.” But maybe I’m totally wrong about that.

summary: How do you know they have 2 apartments though?
question: How do you know they have 2 apartments though?
answer: I don’t know they have two apartments. I have literally no idea where they live, aside from the fact that it’s in London, or what the layout is or anything else like that. I was just commenting on the various two apartment theories I heard (whether one is a filming set or not), but I’ll go back and edit to post to clarify.

blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: also it seems that dan’s complex feelings towards going home are more towards his hometown as opposed to his family. i also get...
question: also it seems that dan’s complex feelings towards going home are more towards his hometown as opposed to his family. i also get the impression that he had a rough time at school (not academically, but socially. he’s shared a few upsetting stories of being bullied or harrassed - i mean someone threw an xacto knife at him!)
answer:
I think complex is a fair word to use based on what we have heard from Dan. As someone who has, as recently as two weeks ago, hid behind several large flower arrangements in a grocery store to avoid having to say hi to someone I went to high school with, I understand. I don’t doubt that Dan was bullied and had bad experiences, some of which he shared and you mentioned.

However, sometimes I do get a little worried that his emo teen branding sends the wrong message to actual teens. Back when Dan was more open about his everyday life, he did talk about his friends from high school and the girlfriend he had and specifically discussed some really positive experiences. I can remember him talking about getting together with friends from home in old liveshows too. Now, I don’t know if he lost touch with these people or if he is still in touch with them and just keeps it quiet for the sake of their privacy. Either is quite plausible in my opinion (I don’t subscribe to the ‘Dan and Phil only hang out with each other’ theory).

My overall point is that I agree that his feelings probably are quite complex, like the feelings many people have of their hometown are, and Dan seems to have had some mixed experiences, but I really hope people don’t buy into this phandom headcannon that Dan was this sad kid doing nothing with no friends who Phil saved because that was never who Dan presented himself as at the time and I think that’s really important to keep in mind.

reblog.comment:
I think complex is a fair word to use based on what we have heard from Dan. As someone who has, as recently as two weeks ago, hid behind several large flower arrangements in a grocery store to avoid having to say hi to someone I went to high school with, I understand. I don’t doubt that Dan was bullied and had bad experiences, some of which he shared and you mentioned.

However, sometimes I do get a little worried that his emo teen branding sends the wrong message to actual teens. Back when Dan was more open about his everyday life, he did talk about his friends from high school and the girlfriend he had and specifically discussed some really positive experiences. I can remember him talking about getting together with friends from home in old liveshows too. Now, I don’t know if he lost touch with these people or if he is still in touch with them and just keeps it quiet for the sake of their privacy. Either is quite plausible in my opinion (I don’t subscribe to the ‘Dan and Phil only hang out with each other’ theory).

My overall point is that I agree that his feelings probably are quite complex, like the feelings many people have of their hometown are, and Dan seems to have had some mixed experiences, but I really hope people don’t buy into this phandom headcannon that Dan was this sad kid doing nothing with no friends who Phil saved because that was never who Dan presented himself as at the time and I think that’s really important to keep in mind.

trail.content_raw:
I think complex is a fair word to use based on what we have heard from Dan. As someone who has, as recently as two weeks ago, hid behind several large flower arrangements in a grocery store to avoid having to say hi to someone I went to high school with, I understand. I don’t doubt that Dan was bullied and had bad experiences, some of which he shared and you mentioned.

However, sometimes I do get a little worried that his emo teen branding sends the wrong message to actual teens. Back when Dan was more open about his everyday life, he did talk about his friends from high school and the girlfriend he had and specifically discussed some really positive experiences. I can remember him talking about getting together with friends from home in old liveshows too. Now, I don’t know if he lost touch with these people or if he is still in touch with them and just keeps it quiet for the sake of their privacy. Either is quite plausible in my opinion (I don’t subscribe to the ‘Dan and Phil only hang out with each other’ theory).

My overall point is that I agree that his feelings probably are quite complex, like the feelings many people have of their hometown are, and Dan seems to have had some mixed experiences, but I really hope people don’t buy into this phandom headcannon that Dan was this sad kid doing nothing with no friends who Phil saved because that was never who Dan presented himself as at the time and I think that’s really important to keep in mind.
trail.content:
I think complex is a fair word to use based on what we have heard from Dan. As someone who has, as recently as two weeks ago, hid behind several large flower arrangements in a grocery store to avoid having to say hi to someone I went to high school with, I understand. I don’t doubt that Dan was bullied and had bad experiences, some of which he shared and you mentioned.

However, sometimes I do get a little worried that his emo teen branding sends the wrong message to actual teens. Back when Dan was more open about his everyday life, he did talk about his friends from high school and the girlfriend he had and specifically discussed some really positive experiences. I can remember him talking about getting together with friends from home in old liveshows too. Now, I don’t know if he lost touch with these people or if he is still in touch with them and just keeps it quiet for the sake of their privacy. Either is quite plausible in my opinion (I don’t subscribe to the ‘Dan and Phil only hang out with each other’ theory).

My overall point is that I agree that his feelings probably are quite complex, like the feelings many people have of their hometown are, and Dan seems to have had some mixed experiences, but I really hope people don’t buy into this phandom headcannon that Dan was this sad kid doing nothing with no friends who Phil saved because that was never who Dan presented himself as at the time and I think that’s really important to keep in mind.

blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: Dnp have 2 flats, one for storage and filming (but they use the other one to film anyway) and one for living. In the filming one...
question: Dnp have 2 flats, one for storage and filming (but they use the other one to film anyway) and one for living. In the filming one there is phils set and in the living one there is 2 bedrooms wich means even if phil has a set he still has his own bedroom. But anyway i dont get how people can think they sleep together when it always have been obvious they do not. Even if they are in a relationship, its clear they always had their own bedrooms
answer:
This theory makes sense to me. I find it plausible that the “AmazingPhil” room could be Phil’s bedroom too, but I actually think the filming flat theory makes more sense since I assume they would be using business funds to pay for that apartment and it would be a business expense, like renting office space, rather than just renting two apartments and splitting up rent a bunch of ways.

*To clarify: I have no idea how many apartments they rent or the layouts or anything like that. I’m just commenting on the various two apartment theories here*
